name: Anand Revgade
about: I am working as a Design engineer in Aerospace sector at Eaton India Innovation Center. I am aware of modeling and simulating softwares like Creo, Catia v5, Solidworks, Fusion 360 and Ansys. I have qualified Rashtrapati Scout testing exam at Ramtek, Nagpur. I am also aware of programming languages such as C, C++, Python. Besides programming languages ,I am also aware of MATLAB, Data Science, AI & ML. I am a self learner with lots of dreams to be accomplished. All I know is a drop, all I don't know is an ocean. Diving deeper into the ocean of knowledge.

recommendations: Smit Deshmukh “I have had the pleasure of knowing Anand for the past 2 years. He is always punctual, his knowledge is vast and extensive. His performance at Personality Advancement Circle of Engineers(PACE) was golden. Give him the really challenging tasks, the ones that everyone else is struggling with, and he will get them done. Anand will find a way to weather any storm with a smile. Certainly someone I'd want to to have on my team.”

Janhvi Harne “Anand and I have worked in MESA-MESC and also shared the same post as Program Director. He is very enthusiastic towards every work he has been provided. He always does proper research about the work assigned. He is technical as well as non-technical person. He has the ability to come up with new ideas. Overall he is a team player, hardworking and passionate towards his work. I would like to recommend him.”
